page.title: 20LETWELL STREET FAIR
page.content:
On the sixth of{July}at 3:00{Letwell {Street Fair}was held on{Barker Hades {Road.}First of all the{fancy dress}was held.Then{Mr.Liddle}the{Vicar}gave a speech. Then the fair was opened by {Mr.}and{Mrs Fraser.}There was a{cake} {stall,Tombola,Raffle,Coconut shy,Bat {the Rat,Pony Rides,Lucky Dip,Drinks, {Books stall}and a game of{Skittles.} There was a{Farm Exhibition}with {tractors}of the past and new{tractors} as well. There was a{NEW HOLLAND} {Combine Harvester}and a{JCB Forklift} {Truck.}You were allowed in all of them. There was a bit where you could have some food and something to drink.
Work on these pages compiled by Class 7 Woodsetts Junior School.
